column3: Is there currently a strong reason to have the `shutdown` argument in `Flush()`?
@promag I don't think so, what would be the alternative?
> Is there currently a strong reason to have the `shutdown` argument in `Flush()`?\n\nI don't believe so. It's a holdover from https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/10767/files
@jnewbery @MarcoFalke thanks, so I guess we all agree it can be cleaned up.\n\nutACK 318b1f7.
This is not right, this will mess other dbs in the same env.
